about_the_game:
Full Speed ​​Animals Disorder is a game where you can blow away almost anything.
You can ram it and send it flying, send missiles to send it flying, or just send it flying by itself.
Avoid beams from UFOs or run away from something to avoid being caught up.
This world is not Earth, it is a story about returning to Earth.

This game is quite difficult.
The slightest mistake can lead to a game over, will you be able to clear the game?
It is also ideal for use as an RTA for each character.

Also, after the game is over, there will be a mission...


■How to operate
-W/UpArrow: Previous/Up
-A/LeftArrow:Left
-S/DownArrow:Back/Down
-D/RightArrow: Right
-Space:Skill activation/confirmation
-R:Missile launch
-LeftClick: Confirm

■Game over conditions
-Flying high in the sky
-time up
-Falling
-If someone catches up with you

name: Full Speed Animals - Disorder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730, 1 GB / AMD Radeon R7 240, 1 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-8370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GRX 650 Ti, 2 GB / AMD Radeon HD 7770, 2GB / Intel Arc A370M, 4GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Let's escape from this planet by car? Fly in the sky with a sparrow? Can you run with a cheetah? Or... Customize your character by entering the pit during the game! "I have to use my skills! Gosh!!" "I'm so excited! I'm back!!" "What is that? A UFO!!" "Something is chasing me from behind!!"
